schedule.cannotEditTask: You do not have permission to edit this task

budget.equipmentHint: Includes machinery, tools and subcontracted services

budget.resourceDeletedDesc: The resource was removed from the APU
budget.confirmBaselineDesc1: This version will be the project reference.
budget.confirmBaselineDesc2: Only one baseline version per project.
budget.confirmBaselineDesc3: Other baseline versions will revert to draft.
budget.confirmBaselineDesc4: You can keep editing until approval.
budget.confirmApprovalDesc1: The version will be locked and cannot be edited.
budget.confirmApprovalDesc2: You can only create new versions from this one.
budget.confirmDeleteDesc: This will delete {code} - {name}. This action cannot be undone.
budget.confirmDeleteWithChildrenDesc: {code} - {name} has {count} subtasks. Deleting will remove all of them.
budget.modeSimpleActivated: Simple mode activated. One set of percentages for all lines.
budget.modeAdvancedActivated: Advanced mode activated. You can set markups per line.
budget.simpleModeDesc: One set of percentages (overhead, financial, profit, tax) applies to all budget lines.
budget.advancedModeDesc: Each line can have its own markup and tax percentages.
budget.confirmModeChangeDesc: In Simple Mode, global markups will apply to all lines.
budget.confirmModeChangeWarning: Per-line markups will be replaced by globals.
budget.linesFirstPlanillaNote: Define budget items in Budget Lines. Once you approve this version, it becomes the definitive summary sheet for certifications, schedule, and finances.
